text: Nick Kerasiotis (July 4, 1918 – May 23, 2002) was an American football guard. He played for the Chicago Bears in 1942 and 1945. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Players of American football from Illinois Category:American football guards Category:St. Ambrose Fighting Bees football players Category:Iowa Hawkeyes football players Category:Chicago Bears players
title: Nick Kerasiotis
